name: io.github.m2ai-mcp-servers/n8n-mcp
description: MCP server for n8n workflow management. Provides AI assistants with the ability to review workflow status in n8n instances.

required.name: N8N_BASE_URL
required.description: Base URL of your n8n instance (no trailing slash)

required.name: N8N_API_KEY
required.description: API key from n8n Settings > API

tools.name: check_workflows
tools.description: Reviews all workflows and reports their status, including active/inactive counts and workflows with recent errors
